statements: DELETE FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND outlier_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE id = 10 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM anomalies_table WHERE id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
DELETE FROM anomaly_logs WHERE anomaly_id IN (SELECT id FROM anomalies WHERE severity > 5);
DELETE FROM QualityControl WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM anomaly_products WHERE product_id = 200 AND category = 'Electronics';
